review: i LOVE this item! its amazing and so easy to install! within minutes of set up I was watching netflix it was so cool! i would 100% recomend this product to someone! the only downside was the batteries that it came with only lasted a couple of days but i put energizer ones in and it is fine now
author: Amazon Customer
